channel.title: Hiding the server IP and Port number?
channel.description: I don't want people to be able to change the IP and port number in my client so they can't use it for there stuff I would also like them to not be able to see the IP area and port area is this possible?

item.title: Hiding the server IP and Port number?
item.dc:creator: @Tenacious_T Tenacious T
item.description:
@Tenacious_T wrote:

Yes, Go into your EGUI.Java and you will see:

[code]import java.awt.BorderLayout;
import java.awt.Cursor;
import java.awt.event.ActionEvent;
import java.awt.event.ActionListener;
import javax.swing.*;

public class EGUI
{
public static void main(String args[])
{
client.main(new String[] {
“Server here”, “Server here”, “Server here”
});
}
}
[/code]

Then open your Client.Java in your client Folder and search for Server IP you will see:

aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4_1272.method389(false, true, c / 2 - 90, 0xfff00, "@whi@Server IP: " + server + ((anInt1216 == 0) & (anInt1105 % 40 < 20) ? "@xxx@|" : ""), j); j += 15;

Delete That, And then compile good luck, Hope this helps
